tool.name: Visualize Ripley L [SPAC][DMAP]
tool.description: Plot the Ripley L function for two phenotypes, multiple radii, regions, and simulations.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information.
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}, "figures": {"type": "directory", "name": "figures_dir"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --bool-values Plot_Specific_Regions Plot_Simulations --list-values Regions_Label_s_ --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.visualize_ripley_l_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: Center_Phenotype
param.label: Center Phenotype
param.help: The phenotype of the anchor cells.

param.name: Neighbor_Phenotype
param.label: Neighbor Phenotype
param.help: The phenotype of the neighbors cells.

param.name: Plot_Specific_Regions
param.label: Plot Specific Regions
param.help: Set to True to plot Ripley L for specific regions of interest. If True, set the two parameters "Regions Annotation" and "Regions Labels(s)"

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: The label(s) of the region(s) to plot.

param.name: Plot_Simulations
param.label: Plot Simulations
param.help: Plot the 95% confidence interval for the poisson point process simulations.

tool.help: **Visualize Ripley L [SPAC][DMAP]** Plot the Ripley L function for two phenotypes, multiple radii, regions, and simulations.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv) - figures: directory (figures_dir)
